aboutmetext: HELLO! I'M ARIANA, A PASSIONATE FULL STACK DEVELOPER WITH EXPERIENCE IN JAVASCRIPT, NODE.JS, EXPRESS, REACT, REDUX, CSS, HTML, SQL, AND MORE. I EXCEL IN PROBLEM-SOLVING AND MAINTAIN A POSITIVE APPROACH TO NEW CHALLENGES. I ENJOY COMBINING LOGIC AND CREATIVITY TO CREATE INNOVATIVE SOLUTIONS THAT DRIVE PROJECTS FORWARD. I'M ALWAYS OPEN TO NEW CHALLENGES AND OPPORTUNITIES FOR PROFESSIONAL GROWTH.
